name: Semi-Automatic
description:
Find the trailer here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2sEkUdyAb5E

Free for a limited time only!

Semi-Automatic throws you into the cockpit of a fabulously expensive war machine and trains you for the trials and tribulations of the inevitable robot uprising. Plow through the ever-growing mechanized hordes with lasers, rockets, and devastating magnets.

You will need to use everything on hand to survive for as long as possible. Sometimes you will need to use all of your weapons at once. Friends may be brought in as copilots in order to ease this burden.
